page.title: 06A Girl's Day
page.content: At 4.30a.m.I was ready to go on my milkround.I had put my school uniform on because I knew I would be late getting back.By the time we had finished it was 8.30a.m.Dad made me my breakfast while I gave the cat its.By 9a.m.I was in school assembly.Time flew by all day but it had been a very boring school day.When I got home I went to the field and saddled up my horse.I got tea at 6.00p.m.because Dad had been out.After tea I helped wash up then sat down to watch T.V.There was not a lot on so I switched it off and did my homework.At 8.30p.m.I decided that I would go to bed.
